question: S.Amdt. 18 (Fischer) to S. 1: To provide limits on the designation of new federally protected land.
question_details: On the Amendment in the Senate

related_bill.current_status_description: This bill was vetoed. The Senate attempted to override the veto on March 4, 2015 but failed.
major_actions: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1.

<calendar datetime="2015-01-07" state="REPORTED" calendar="Senate Legislative" under="General Orders" number="1">
      <text>Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1.</text>
    </calendar>
Passed Senate with amendments by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 36. Record Vote Number: 49.

<vote how="roll" type="vote" roll="49" datetime="2015-01-29" where="s" result="pass" state="PASS_OVER:SENATE">
      <text>Passed Senate with amendments by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 36. Record Vote Number: 49.</text>
      <reference ref="CR S637-641" label="text"/>
    </vote>
On passage Passed by the Yeas and Nays: 270 - 152 (Roll no. 75).

<vote how="roll" type="vote2" roll="75" datetime="2015-02-11T17:14:00-05:00" where="h" result="pass" state="PASSED:BILL">
      <text>On passage Passed by the Yeas and Nays: 270 - 152 (Roll no. 75).</text>
      <reference ref="CR H947-950" label="text"/>
    </vote>

<vetoed datetime="2015-02-24" state="PROV_KILL:VETO">
      <text>Vetoed by President.</text>
      <reference ref="CR S1073" label="text of veto message"/>
    </vetoed>
Failed of passage in Senate over veto by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 37. Record Vote Number: 68.

<vote how="roll" type="override" roll="68" datetime="2015-03-04" where="s" result="fail" state="VETOED:OVERRIDE_FAIL_ORIGINATING:SENATE">
      <text>Failed of passage in Senate over veto by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 37. Record Vote Number: 68.</text>
    </vote>
related_bill.title: S. 1: Keystone XL Pipeline Approval Act
titles: A bill to approve the Keystone XL Pipeline.
